titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning Ireland and the different interests thereof, in answer to the Exon and Barnstaple petitions shewing, that if a law were enacted to prevent the exportation of woollen-manufactures from Ireland to foreign parts, what the consequences thereof would be both to England and Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Brewster, Francis, Sir, d. 1704.

titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning Ireland and the different interests thereof, in answer to the Exon and Barnstaple petitions shewing, that if a law were enacted to prevent the exportation of woollen-manufactures from Ireland to foreign parts, what the consequences thereof would be both to England and Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Brewster, Francis, Sir, d. 1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Nott at the Queen's-Arms the Pall-Mall, and are to be sold by E. Whitlock at Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
